txt.en: <rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The Upper Mustering Hall is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the Audience Chamber</rgb>
'Mazog has fallen and Zigilburk is returned, it is a good day to be a dwarf. Let us head back and celebrate with some ale.'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Gundnákh has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
'Let them come!'
'It is done. Mazog is defeated, and Zigilburk is returned.'
'My wounds are severe! I cannot fight any longer!'
'Mazog! Return Zigilburk at once, or I will destroy you with my own hand!'
'With this axe of mithril, not even the ruler of this tower can keep Mazog a prisoner!'
'But first you will die!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Hogaward falls to your mighty blow</rgb>
'Onward, friends! You must continue the fight!'
The Audience Chamber has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The Audience Chamber is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Urbor has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: In the room below, Blord enters the tower and roars</rgb>
The Armoury has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The Entrance Hall is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: From back down the hall Hogaward yells, 'The brigands of Bree-land and Dol Guldur will be allies!'</rgb>
'I will hold this place! You must advance further into the tower!'
Claim the Entrance Hall
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the Lower Mustering Hall</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Blord has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
Claim the Audience Chamber
The Upper Mustering Hall has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
Claim the Lower Mustering Hall
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The Lower Mustering Hall is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
Claim the Upper Mustering Hall
Claim the Armoury
Claim the Armoury
Bróin must survive the battle
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: Múdku comes screaming from a side room, 'Mine! Mine! Get away!'</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: The flames on the braziers are curiously unlit</rgb>
'What is this?'
'Is this some trick? You cannot have been such a fool to come here!'
'I feared I would need to hunt you down, but you have saved me the trouble!'
'You caused me such trouble while you were alive.'
'My kingdom, stolen by dwarves!'
'You have not won, [placeholder].'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: The lanterns ahead are curiously unlit</rgb>
'To be shackled and brought to this prison of nightmares, here to be jailed alongside dirty dwarves!'
'The Orcs of Moria will avenge my death.'
<rgb=#00FF00>You have claimed the Entrance Hall. Gears grind to the south as the gate to the Audience Chamber opens</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: This weapon rack contains nothing of interest</rgb>
'But my imprisonment did not last long!'
'Hear me, Bróin, and let your courage seep away!'
<rgb=#00FF00>You have claimed the Audience Chamber. Gears grind to the east as the gate to the Lower Mustering Hall opens</rgb>
'There are still Orcs in this tower who respect the name of Mazog, Ruler of Caves!'
'Wherever your people catch a glint of gold, or silver, or gems beneath the mountains...'
<rgb=#00FF00>You have claimed the Lower Mustering Hall. Gears grind to the south as the gate to the Upper Mustering Hall opens</rgb>
'It is not to be, lowly dwarf! I came to this chamber for a reason!'
'...there will be an Orc to slay him, every one. That is my vow! That is the word of Mazog!'
<rgb=#00FF00>You have claimed the Upper Mustering Hall. Gears grind to the west as the gate to the Armoury opens</rgb>
'Help me, friends! I am too fatigued to continue!'
<rgb=#00FF00>You have claimed the Armoury and recovered Zigilburk</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Bróin has been defeated</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A roar erupts from below you as Gundnákh emerges from his room</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Iaerien has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
Entrance Hall
Audience Chamber
Lower Mustering Hall
Upper Mustering Hall
Armoury
'Let them come and meet their ending!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: As the second flame lights, Thangaran comes screaming around the corner ahead</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the Entrance Hall</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: This room contains several weapon racks that might be worth searching</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Gadhumúrz has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
The Battle in the Tower
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Múdku has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
'I cannot believe our good fortune, [placeholder]!'
'The secret passage Thurimen has brought us up through the very foundations of Dol Guldur!'
'You must aid the Golden Host as they do battle throughout the tower.'
'I too have taken an oath, Mazog. See it now fulfilled!'
'I will find Zigilburk, and meet up with you later!'
The Entrance Hall has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Growling comes from down the hall. Gadhumúrz is hungry</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Thangaran has been defeated by your mighty blow</rgb>
The Enemy is entrenched within the Tower of Dol Guldur. It is time to strike them at their heart.
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the Upper Mustering Hall</rgb>
'The battle rages on! Our foes will fall before us like wheat-stalks at harvest-time!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: A roar and the clanging of armour echoes down the hallway ahead</rgb>
'The attack is going well! Continue onward, and seize victory for the Golden Host!'
'Fight on, [placeholder]! I will make certain our foes fear Lanchigil and Egnassigil!'
The Lower Mustering Hall has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Maniacal laughing echoes from ahead</rgb>
'Mazog!'
'I swore to end you, Mazog, and I will see it done!'
In order to secure the Tower, the Entrance Hall must first be claimed.
The Entrance Hall is secure, and Sigileth will ensure nothing enters from behind you. The next target is the Audience Chamber across the hall.
With the Entrance Hall and Audience Chamber claimed, you may begin to climb the Tower and seek to claim the Lower Mustering Hall.
The Upper Mustering Hall is directly above the Lower...with it claimed, the Enemy will be confused and any reinforcements poorly armed.
With the Mustering Halls claimed, it is time to take the Armoury and reclaim Zigilburk.
With the Mustering Halls claimed, it is time to take the Armoury and reclaim Zigilburk.
'Battle refreshes and rejuvinates me. Send us the best you have, Dol Guldur!'
